{{Redirect|5AL|the seaplane base in Alabama, United States with the FAA code 5AL|Fish River Seaplane Base}} {{Radio station | image =<!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Abclocalradio.png]] -->| name = 783 ABC Alice Springs| callsigns = 8AL | airdate = [[1981]] | frequency = 783 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] | area = [[Alice Springs]] | owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | website = [http://abc.net.au/alicesprings/ http://abc.net.au/alicesprings/] | }} '''783 ABC Alice Springs''' (call sign: '''8AL''') is the [[ABC Local Radio]] station in [[Alice Springs, Northern Territory]]. It broadcasts on 783 [[kilohertz|kHz]] on the [[amplitude modulation|AM]] band.
==See also== *[[List of Australian radio stations]]
==External links== * [http://www.abc.net.au/alicesprings/] ABC Alice Springs Online
